job_description:
• We want our intern to recognize, identify, and raise awareness of process anomalies with the motivation of "who needs to know this now.
• " Pursuing a Bachelor’s degree or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Materials Science & Engineering, or related field.
• Must be a current student, must not graduate before September 2026.
• We need someone who will investigating process anomalies, root cause analysis, data manipulation, and correlations.
• Experience running Scanning Electron Microscope and/or Focused Ion Beam tools.
• We need an intern drawn to creative problem solving and innovative solutions.
• Excellent technical, communication, and analytical skills.
• Possess a continuous improvement process (CIP) demeanor, looking for ways to improve operations, and how to make a difference today.
